forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 8C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 47F. Winds W at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clearing skies after some morning light rain. Thunder possible. High 13C. Winds W at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 59F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 49F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending early. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 59F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.
